effect.black_white: User switches position on the field with the friendly Pokémon opposite it. If the user is in the middle position in a triple battle, or there are no other friendly Pokémon, this move will fail.
effect.black_2_white_2: User switches position on the field with the friendly Pokémon opposite it. If the user is in the middle position in a triple battle, or there are no other friendly Pokémon, this move will fail.

short_effect.black_white: User switches places with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: User switches places with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.

flavor_text.black_white: The user teleports using a strange power and switches its place with one of its allies.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user teleports using a strange power and switches its place with one of its allies.
